display_name: [Breathing and Timing in Unison] Trunks (Kid) + Goten (Kid)

kit.leader_skill: "Hybrid Saiyans" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%

super_attack.name: Ki Blast Cannon
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Trunks' Imminent Battle
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 150% up; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Damage reduction rate 30% up; When attacking: ATK 150% up; For every PHY Ki Sphere obtained: ATK 40% up and DEF 20% up; 1 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; 2 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained: DEF 150% up when attacking; 3 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained: Guards all attacks

lines.context: For 1 turn from the character's entry turn
For every PHY Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
lines.context: 1 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained
2 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained
3 or more PHY Ki Spheres obtained

lines.text: Meets up with Goten (Kid) and can perform Reversible Exchange
lines.context: Starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle

reversible_exchange.condition: Starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle: Meets up with Goten (Kid) and can perform Reversible Exchange

active_skill.name: Fusion
active_skill.effect: Greatly raises ATK temporarily; Causes ultimate damage to enemy; ATK +30%; Changes INT Ki Spheres; to PHY Ki Spheres for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle (once only, be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
